Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the definition of a public body pursuant to the open meetings law
Summary: Relates to the definition of a public body pursuant to the open meetings law; includes any advisory committee or similar body created by such public body or pursuant to federal, state or local law or any entity consisting of two or more members created by executive order of the governor.
LawCode: Amd ยง102, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the definition of a public body pursuant to the open meetings law
